Download recovery.img in download link Reboot phone to bootloader Open any terminal like cmd etc, enter “fastboot flash recovery recovery.img” Reboot phone to recovery and enter sideload mode Enter “adb sideload xxx” (xxx means the filename of rom zip you downloaded) Do factory reset in recovery (Mandatory for first time flash) Reboot You can also use rom installer to flash the way you did before.
